security: This document reveals details about Operation MONGOOSE, including specific actions such as intelligence gathering, infiltration tactics, and attempts to influence foreign governments. Sharing this information could expose sensitive operational methods and compromise ongoing or future covert actions against Cuba.
summary: This document consists of index cards summarizing various aspects of Operation MONGOOSE, including meetings of the Special Group Augmented, intelligence plans, and actions aimed at destabilizing the Cuban government.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of index cards from June-July 1975 summarizes various aspects of Operation MONGOOSE, a covert operation aimed at destabilizing the Cuban government. The cards detail discussions within the Special Group Augmented regarding intelligence collection, infiltration tactics, and economic warfare, as well as coordination with other government agencies and foreign entities. Key topics include efforts to recruit Cuban agents, disrupt Cuban transportation, and influence public opinion in Latin America.
title: [R]
